name: TensorFlowJS
description: An external module to perform TensorFlow analysis coupled with REDCap survey questions

system-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

project-settings.name:
Base64 Image Field
(optional) The image will be stored as a base64 string in this field

File Field
(optional) Store the image as a file in this field

Model Results
Field to store model results (as json object)

Display Record ID
If checked, user will see the record ID of their latest submission for reference

Ajax Saves
If checked, the form will save via ajax preventing the need to re-warm the model

Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox
